name: TuneUp Utilities Boot Screen
summary: Learn about .TBS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BootScreenView can be used to convert TBS files to .BOOTSKIN files.

description: Image used for customizing the Windows boot screen with TuneUp Utilities; compressed using .ZIP compression to save disk space; may be modified using the TuneUp Styler (previously WinStyler) program included with TuneUp Utilities.
